short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert between units quickly without leaving the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UnitSwitch is a simple and intuitive Chrome extension that allows users to quickly and easily convert various units of measurement, including temperature, length, weight, speed, and cooking measurements. The extension is designed to provide fast and accurate conversions, all within a clean and user-friendly interface. Whether you're converting Celsius to Fahrenheit, miles to kilometers, or gallons to liters, UnitSwitch offers a seamless experience for all your unit conversion needs without having to leave your browser tab.




Created by Shawn Wheeler and Amanda Treutler
http://shawnwheeler.dev/
http://amandatreutler.com/
